name: Dark Web Monitoring
description: Tracking cybercriminal activities and stolen data on the dark web.

cards.title: Monitoring Dark Web Marketplaces
cards.description: Techniques to track cybercriminal transactions and data leaks.
cards.bulletpoints: Tor Networks, Darknet Forums, Cryptocurrency Tracing
cards.summaryText: Keep tabs on hidden marketplaces so stolen data and actors surface fast.

cards.title: Identifying Leaked Credentials and Stolen Data
cards.description: Detecting compromised accounts and sensitive data in dark web dumps.
cards.bulletpoints: Data Breach Monitoring, Threat Intelligence APIs, Credential Stuffing Prevention
cards.summaryText: Sweep breach dumps to spot leaked credentials before attackers reuse them.
